typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		COMPANY as string,
		Shop_Code as integer,
		Shop_Name as string,
		Compartment as string,
		SubCompartment as string,
		TYPE as string,
		nick_name as string,
		prod_code as string,
		quantity as short,
		CST as string,
		Price as string,
		Unit_Price as string,
		CONCESSION_ID as integer,
		CONCESSION_Code as string,
		Price_Reduced as string,
		CONCESSION_Description as string,
		Concession as string,
		Percent_Reduce as double,
		Amount as string,
		TAX_SLAB as double,
		TAXES1 as double,
		TAXES2 as double,
		emp_code as string,
		Emp_Name as string,
		TRANSDATE as long,
		TRANSTIME as integer,
		TRANSNUM as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVSource
source(output(
		POS_ID as integer,
		POS_CODE as string,
		POS_LABEL as string,
		DISTRICT as string,
		BLOCK as string,
		REGION as string,
		TIER as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhdb
dwhdb derive(dimhash = sha1(POS_CODE+ POS_LABEL)) ~> createHash
CreateHashNewData, createHash exists(newdatahash == dimhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, dwhdb lookup(toString(Shop_Code) == POS_CODE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(POS_LABEL = Store_Name,
		POS_CODE = Store_Code,
		{_inserted_dt} = iif(isNull(POS_ID) ,  currentTimestamp(), {_inserted_dt}),
		{_updated_dt} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrributes
SetAttrributes aggregate(groupBy(POS_CODE,
		POS_LABEL,
		POS_ID,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}),
	count = count(POS_CODE)) ~> Aggregate1
CSVSource derive(newdatahash = sha1(toString(Shop_Code) + Shop_Name)) ~> CreateHashNewData
Aggregate1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(POS_ID)),
	updateIf(not(isNull(POS_ID)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		POS_ID as integer,
		POS_CODE as string,
		POS_LABEL as string,
		DISTRICT as string,
		BLOCK as string,
		REGION as string,
		TIER as string,
		{_inserted_dt} as timestamp,
		{_updated_dt} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		POS_CODE,
		POS_LABEL,
		{_inserted_dt},
		{_updated_dt}
	)) ~> sink1
